mapper.select: SELECT * FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY targetdate DESC LIMIT #{dispCount}
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') LIMIT #{dispCount}
SELECT * FROM todo WHERE date_format(targetdate, '%Y-%m-%d') > date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY targetdate ASC LIMIT #{dispCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo (subject, detail, targetdate, done, must, insertdate, modifydate) VALUES (#{todo.subject}, #{todo.detail}, #{todo.str_target_date}, 'N', 'N', now(), now())
